# Project Summary

Here we use single-cell RNA-seq data from primary osteosarcoma in 6 treatment-na√Øve dogs ([Ammons et al, Commun Biol. 2024 Apr 24](https://www.nature.com/articles/s42003-024-06182-w)) as a reference data set to estimate immune cell proportions in bulk tumor samples using parallel methods [MuSiC](https://xuranw.github.io/MuSiC/articles/MuSiC.html) and [SCDC]().

The following cell types are included in the reference data:

  1. TAM    
  2. T cell   
  3. Endothelial cell   
  4. Osteoblast   
  5. T_cycling    
  6. Hypoxic_osteoblast   
  7. Cycling_OC   
  8. Osteoblast_cycling   
  9. B cell   
  10. Neutrophil    
  11. IFN-TAM   
  12. CD320_OC    
  13. Fibroblast    
  14. T_IFN   
  15. IFN-osteoblast    
  16. DC    
  17. NK    
  18. Mature_OC   
  19. Mast cell   
  20. TIM   

Both MuSiC and SCDC take advantage of multi-subject reference data sets appropriatly weighting genes showing cross-subject and cross-cell consistency.
